topics.body:
Hey, Naruto has ended.

Sakura is still alive, what are your thoughts on that?

topics.body:
seriously man, this album is just something out of this world

like, imagine gangsta rap combined with 80´s or 90´s horror flicks

!https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn01.mishkanyc.com/sites/default/files/uploads/2012/03/MistaThug.jpg!
